name: Necromancer Ate My Cat
description:
Poindexter the nerd just wanted a quiet Halloween season full of cheesy horror movies and spooky fun... However, after a necromancer eats his cat just to mess with him, he must fight zombies, skeletons, werewolves, and other classic halloween spooks on a quest to get even. Joined by a middle aged adult film star from the 80's and a ghost who's incapable of saying boo, these three heroes must rise up to save Halloween, avenge a cat, and stop a necromancer's evil plan to take over the world!

Necromancer Ate My Cat is a classic-style jrpg made in the Official Hamster Republic Creation Engine (abbreviated ohrrpgce).
